title: Sunshine
lyrics:
Coko
Darkchild
99
All up in your spine, uh

Sunshine, sunshine
You brighten up my days, I'll love you always (Ooh)
Sunshine (Oh yeah), sunshine (Oh, oh)
Never go away, stay right here with me

Baby, when you're around me you just can't do no wrong
Every way is the right way 'cause your love is so strong
And whenever I need you, you're always right there
To let me know you love me, and how much you care

Sunshine (You are), sunshine (My sunshine)
You brighten up my days (Yeah), I'll love you always (Whoa-oh)
Sunshine (My sunshine), sunshine (Oh)
Never go away, stay right here with me

At first it seemed so hard for me to find
Finally that day came, and my whole life changed
So beautiful true love has made my life
Brung me happy days, chased my clouds away

I believe the day you came my cloudy days swept away
Goodbye to lonely days (Oh yeah)
And I know without you in my life is filled with rain
So stay right here with me (Oh yeah)

Sunshine (You are), sunshine (My sunshine)
You brighten up my days (Yeah), I'll love you always (Oh, you are)
Sunshine (My sunshine), sunshine
Never go away, stay right here with me (Oh, oh)
Sunshine (Oh), sunshine (Oh)
You brighten up my days (Oh), I'll love you always (Yeah)
Sunshine (Sunshine), sunshine (Sunshine)
Never go away, stay right here with me

I believe the day you came my cloudy days swept away
Goodbye to lonely days (Goodbye)
And I know without you in my life is filled with rain
So stay right here with me (Stay with me, yeah)

Sunshine (You are), sunshine (My sunshine)
You brighten up my days, I'll love you always ('Cause you're my)
Sunshine, sunshine
Never go away, stay right here with me
Sunshine, sunshine
You brighten up my days, I'll love you always (Oh yeah)
Sunshine, sunshine (Oh)
Never go away, stay right here with me

Sunshine
(Sunshine, sunshine, I'll love you always)
Sunshine, sunshine
Never go away, stay right here with me
Sunshine, sunshine
